Vortex Robotics

We are a 4th year, award-winning FTC community team located in the San Francisco Bay Area. Through our experience as a self-sustaining robotics team, we have built both our STEM and real-life skills, by learning how to build and program our robot, outreaching to local communities, documenting our work process, and demonstrating Gracious Professionalism.
